overview: Collection of episodes from the animated series which follows twin sister genies Shimmer and Shine as they set out on a number of magical adventures with their human friend Leah. The episodes are: 'Genie Treehouse', 'Ahoy, Genies!', 'The Sweetest Thing', 'Lights! Camera! Genies!', 'What a Pig Mess', 'Abraca-Genie' and 'Dino Might!'.
title: Shimmer and Shine: Magical Flight
